	lui $2, 0x5678
	ori $2, $0, 0x1234
	li $4, 0x12345678
	li $5, 0xf3876324
	ori $3, $0, 0x0234
	sw $2, -4($3) 
	sw $5, -8($3)
	sh $4, 2($3)
	sb $2, 5($3)
	sw $4, 4($3)
	ori $20, $0, 4
	ori $21, $0, 0
for:	
	beq $21, $20, end
	sll $22, $21, 2
	addiu $22, $22, -8
	addu $22, $22, $3
	lw $26, 0($22)
	lb $27, 1($22)
	lbu $25, 0($22)
	lh $24, 0($22)
	lhu $24, 2($22)
	addi $21, $21, 1
	j for
end:
	nop
